column3: Include information about passenger levels, travel restrictions and policy changes, and increases or reductions in flight operations.
Include status updates about the bus terminal, as well as bridges and tunnels. For example, if occupant capacity is at a decreased max, or if traffic is up or down.
Include updates about cargo ships and cruise lines. For example, if there was a "no sail" order.
Include updates about staffing levels and WFH percentages, customer traffic, tenant status updates, policy changes, and any issues.
Include updates about ferry service operations.
